summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 39th Avenue South from Cloverdale Street to Trenton Street; and certain other streets, avenues and easements, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 17174 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
